ci_support_win_64_python3.10.____cpython:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
target_platform:
- win-64
zip_keys:
- - python
  - channel_sources

about.description:
This project aims to be a simple USB/HID user application space
(hence no system drivers needed) 100% python package (without C
extensions). Initially targeting simple HID devices management.
about.summary: USB / HID windows python helper library

name: pywinusb
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "pywinusb" %}
{% set version = "0.4.2" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.zip
  sha256: e2f5e89f7b74239ca4843721a9bda0fc99014750630c189a176ec0e1b35e86df

build:
  number: 8
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"
  skip: True  # [not win]

requirements:
  host:
    - python
    - pip
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python

test:
  imports:
    - pywinusb.hid

about:
  home: https://github.com/rene-aguirre/pywinusb
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: 'USB / HID windows python helper library'
  description: |
    This project aims to be a simple USB/HID user application space 
    (hence no system drivers needed) 100% python package (without C 
    extensions). Initially targeting simple HID devices management.
  doc_url: https://github.com/rene-aguirre/pywinusb
  dev_url: https://github.com/rene-aguirre/pywinusb

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - carlodri

about.description:
This project aims to be a simple USB/HID user application space
(hence no system drivers needed) 100% python package (without C
extensions). Initially targeting simple HID devices management.
about.summary: USB / HID windows python helper library
